_header: Now are the feasts made of Christ
Note: For texts in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 116 and 4629.
_description: Gospel for Trinity Sunday in the Northern Homily Cycle (including the story of the Baptism of Jesus — see 5179 — which also occurs separately); eight 8-line stanzas, ababbcbc, with …‘I take my leue’ refrain

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Now ar þe festis made of cristeþat ar in hali kirk
                    stabiliste…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þat to heuene come may weTo wone wiþ god in trinite
                    . Amen .
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Nou ben þe ffestes made of cristÞat ben in holichirche
                    stablischt…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…In heuene þer redi knowyng schul we seoOf o God and
                    persones þreo. Amen.

Doyle,  I. A.,

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodEngPoetc3.First Lines:
N[ ]þe festes made of crist[ ] in hali kyrke
                    stabellest…
BodEngPoetc3.Last Lines:
…þan says saynt lukeþe wangelystþe haly gast
                    lyghtid on crist

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
NOwe are þe festes made of cristÞat are in holi kirk
                    stabilest…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…In heuen þere gode wityng sale beOf one god and persones
                    thre

CULDd11.First Lines:
NOw ben þe festis made of cristÞat ben in holi chirche
                    stabelist…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…In heuene þer we redi knowing schul seOf o god and
                    persones thre

CULGg531.First Lines:
Now ere festes made of crysteþat hyre in haly kyrk
                    stabelyste…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…And bryng vs to þat mykill blysÞat to ryght trowand
                    ordaynd is
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
Þis es þe gospell of þe trinite sononday (f.
                    91v)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Now ar the festis maide of crysteThat er in halykirke
                    stabileste…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…That to heuen come may weTo wonne with hym in
                    trinite

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Now er þer festys made of crysteþat er in haly kyrke
                    stabileste…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…And what here says oure gospellIn stede of a tale I wyll
                    ȝow tell

HunHM129.First Lines:
Now beth þe festis made off cristÞat beth in holy chyrche
                    stablys…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And what here of seith þe gospellIn sted off tale I will
                    ȝow tell
